ygData.subject: Re: Bards and Mob Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the mobs in Unrest just hate us.  I can be inside the zone about 30 minutes before I have a random mob attack me from nowhere, whether I m playing a
ygData.messageBody:
I think the mobs in Unrest just hate us. I can be inside the zone about 30
minutes before I have a random mob attack me from nowhere, whether I'm
playing a song or not and no matter which songs I've played in the zone. I
haven't seen this in any other zone, and thankfully they've always come when
we were ready to pull anyway so it saved us some work. It's a weird
phenomenon that I have yet to understand. If anyone has any clues about
this I would appreciate it, I hope to be going back there next week to
tackle the basement.

Anthem Dirgemaker
24th level Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: silky@... [mailto:silky@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 05, 1999 3:58 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Bards and Mob Hate
>
>
> From: silky@...
>
>
> Ok, I've read a lot on this list about how badly the critters hate us,
> never really experienced it till last night.
>
> I expected it to come from me healing my group - the way it happened was a
> bit of a surprise.
>
> I was showing the group I was with what twisting guardian and protective
> rythms did for their resistance with a drum, and good god - every greater,
> db and barbed skele on our side of unrest was making a beeline for ME!
>
> We probably could have handled it had I known the reaction was gonna be
> like that, and I sure as heck would have run quicker -
> thankfully, I am the
> only one that died.
>
> I was only affecting my group - these things came from out of
> NOWHERE - why
> would this act like such a magnet?
>
> Anyway - I think I'm gonna get a really good group together (one that can
> handle that kind of heat) - and do it purposefully (a little less
> long) and
> we won't need to debate on who the puller is anymore - looks like I'm
> nominated as bait.
>
>
>
>
